description: Sanofi's apparent readiness to favour the US market with any Covid-19 vaccine caused a row in France.
title: Coronavirus Sanofi: French drug giant rows back after vaccine storm
title_page: Coronavirus Sanofi: French drug giant rows back after vaccine storm - BBC News
maintext: But speaking on French news channel BFMTV, he said this would only be possible "if Europeans work as quickly as the Americans", and added that the US government had pledged to spend "several hundreds of millions of euros".
